TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Fuad_Masum, title = Fuad_Masum, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuad_Masum} }

S.FORM: = Fuad Masum = Mntucing hngkawas 1938 idas 1 jiyax 1 ka Fuad Masum ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Iraq ta sayang o kiya ka Fuad Masum, pnaah hngkawas 2014 idas 7 jiyax 24 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Mohamed Fuad Masum (Kari Kud : فوئاد مەعسووم‎, kari Arabian: فؤاد معصوم‎, kngkawas 1938 idas 1 diyax 1－), mdhu balay sediq Kud seyjicya. Kngkawas 1992 wada mangal Iraq Kurdistan muway bay congri. Mniq kngkawas 2003 mqraq ka Saddam Hussein cngcweyn daw, Fuad Masum ka mnngalan Iraq Kokomin Gikay Rinji Gicyo, kiya u pusu balau snbarah Iraq burah keyngpo uri. Mniq kngkawas 2014 Iraq Gikay seyngkyo mnhdu daw, wada wewan phiyu tu7 soto Iraq, kiya ka lmutuc Jalal Talabani daw tu2 uxay sediq Arabian na soto Iraq. Nrading niya kndusan mi kyoiku早期的生活和教育 Mohamed Fuad Masum pa mntuting tudaya Iraq nniqan Koya na Khabanen. Mniq Kurdistan pyasan slhayan snhiyan muyas, hiti daw mtmay Pyasan Tubeyhing Baghdad smluhay horicu mi waya Islam kyo. Kngkawas 1958, Fuad Masum musa Pyasan Tubeyhing Cairo Al-azhar mhdu pnyasan niya tubaraw kyoiku. Kngkawas 1968 mniq Pyasan Tubeyhing Basra ngalan mptusa. Kngkawas 1975 mangal Pyasan Tubeyhing Al-azhar na Islam ceswey hakasey sweywey. Kndusan Seyji政治生涯 Kyosangto共產黨 Fuad Masum mniq kngkawas 1962 tumal Iraq Kyosangto, kngkawas 1964 musa Syria mtqita Syria Kyosangto suki Khalid Bakdash, wada mkla Khalid Bakdash qnita niya sediq Kud daw, Fuad Masum pa wada malax Kyosangto dmi tumal Kurdistan Mincu Tang. Kurdistan Mincu Tang庫爾德斯坦民主黨 Kngkawas 1968 Fuad Masum u ngalan Kurdistan Mincu Tang mniq Basra na dayhyo, dhuq kngkawas 1975. Kngkawas 1976 wada mnKurdistan Umalu Qnlhangan Ryeynmong (PUK) pusu pnhiyu niya uri. Kngkawas 1992, Fuad Masum ka mnKurdistan dayhyotwan cngweyn mi tbrinah miyah Baghdad, wada Mpbatas Keyngpo Yingkay uri. Kngkawas 2004 cida, wada mtu1 Dayhyo Yingkay na gicyo. Soto總統 Spuda Iraq babaw mccbu hiti na seyji kcyu, qpahun congri Iraq u, kiya ka snpeyyah knhbaraw niya Syeypay ka mangal qpahun, qpahun gikay na gicyo u Syunnipay ka mangal qpahun, kiya mi soto u sediq Kud ka mangal qpahun. Kngkawas 2014 cida, Fuad Masum pa wada phyuwan gikay tu7 soto Iraq. Kwohuy u mniq idas 7 diyax 24 muda mn2 rwen meytaq hyo, mniq 269 hyo ka kcka bneytaq hyo pa, Fuad Masum u wada mangal mbiyax 211 hyo, pnsung hiya ka Barham Saleh u wana balay 17 hyo. Mniq meytaq soto hyo brah cida, Ryeynhkwo misucang Pan Ciwen u mniq Baghdad mtqita Iraq congri Macchili daw mniq kcka cicehuy, rmngaw ka hiya: 'Iraq saya pa wisu snturung smtali kndusan, so muda mkala niyi u, kasi ka spuda pssli phiyu kingal niqan balay llabang lhbun na seyhu, kingal malu muda psbalay knkana pnslhbnan syakay cyunti na seyhu, kiya ka knkana quri ddaun anjeyng, seyji, syakay mi keyjay'. Papak

= Foad Masom = Mntocing hngkawas 1938 idas 1 jiyax 1 ka Foad Masom ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Iraq ta sayang o kiya ka Foad Masom, pnaah hngkawas 2014 idas 7 jiyax 24 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Mohamed Foad Masom (Kari Kod : فوئاد مەعسووم‎, kari Arabian: فؤاد معصوم‎, kngkawas 1938 idas 1 diyax 1－), mdho balay sediq Kod seyjicya. Kngkawas 1992 wada mangal Iraq Kordistan moway bay congri. Mniq kngkawas 2003 mqraq ka Saddam Hossein cngcweyn daw, Foad Masom ka mnngalan Iraq Kokomin Gikay Rinji Gicyo, kiya o poso balao snbarah Iraq borah keyngpo ori. Mniq kngkawas 2014 Iraq Gikay seyngkyo mnhdo daw, wada wewan phiyo to7 soto Iraq, kiya ka lmotoc Jalal Talabani daw to2 oxay sediq Arabian na soto Iraq. Nrading niya kndosan mi kyoiko早期的生活和教育 Mohamed Foad Masom pa mntoting todaya Iraq nniqan Koya na Khabanen. Mniq Kordistan pyasan slhayan snhiyan moyas, hiti daw mtmay Pyasan Tobeyhing Baghdad smlohay horico mi waya Islam kyo. Kngkawas 1958, Foad Masom mosa Pyasan Tobeyhing Cairo Al-azhar mhdo pnyasan niya tobaraw kyoiko. Kngkawas 1968 mniq Pyasan Tobeyhing Basra ngalan mptosa. Kngkawas 1975 mangal Pyasan Tobeyhing Al-azhar na Islam ceswey hakasey sweywey. Kndosan Seyji政治生涯 Kyosangto共產黨 Foad Masom mniq kngkawas 1962 tomal Iraq Kyosangto, kngkawas 1964 mosa Syria mtqita Syria Kyosangto soki Khalid Bakdash, wada mkla Khalid Bakdash qnita niya sediq Kod daw, Foad Masom pa wada malax Kyosangto dmi tomal Kordistan Minco Tang. Kordistan Minco Tang庫爾德斯坦民主黨 Kngkawas 1968 Foad Masom o ngalan Kordistan Minco Tang mniq Basra na dayhyo, dhoq kngkawas 1975. Kngkawas 1976 wada mnKordistan Umalo Qnlhangan Ryeynmong (PUK) poso pnhiyo niya ori. Kngkawas 1992, Foad Masom ka mnKordistan dayhyotwan cngweyn mi tbrinah miyah Baghdad, wada Mpbatas Keyngpo Yingkay ori. Kngkawas 2004 cida, wada mto1 Dayhyo Yingkay na gicyo. Soto總統 Spoda Iraq babaw mccbo hiti na seyji kcyo, qpahon congri Iraq o, kiya ka snpeyyah knhbaraw niya Syeypay ka mangal qpahon, qpahon gikay na gicyo o Syonnipay ka mangal qpahon, kiya mi soto o sediq Kod ka mangal qpahon. Kngkawas 2014 cida, Foad Masom pa wada phyowan gikay to7 soto Iraq. Kwohoy o mniq idas 7 diyax 24 moda mn2 rwen meytaq hyo, mniq 269 hyo ka kcka bneytaq hyo pa, Foad Masom o wada mangal mbiyax 211 hyo, pnsong hiya ka Barham Saleh o wana balay 17 hyo. Mniq meytaq soto hyo brah cida, Ryeynhkwo misocang Pan Ciwen o mniq Baghdad mtqita Iraq congri Macchili daw mniq kcka cicehoy, rmngaw ka hiya: 'Iraq saya pa wiso sntorong smtali kndosan, so moda mkala niyi o, kasi ka spoda pssli phiyo kingal niqan balay llabang lhbon na seyho, kingal malo moda psbalay knkana pnslhbnan syakay cyonti na seyho, kiya ka knkana qori ddaon anjeyng, seyji, syakay mi keyjay'. Papak
